pages.title: Silver
pages.text: Silver is a resource that naturally generates in the overworld, from Y level -48 up to Y level 16.$(br)Using it as a tool material is basically a waste, due to its innate magical properties. However a few alloys use such holy material as an ingredient.
Silver is material extremely useful in magical applications.
Due to its natural attunement with magic, one $(o)could$() forge a sword made out of Silver to imbue strong enchantments on it. No enchantment can make it any lighter though.
